Name: Dostonbek
description: Dostonbek, 25, is a hardworking young man.  He was born and grew up in a village called Nidzhoni.  He is married but doesn't have any children yet.  He has a two-room house with all commodities.  He is involved in farming and animal husbandry.  He owns 1.5 hectares of land from the midsized peasant farm and grows grapes on 0.5 hectare and various crops such as onions and carrots on one hectare of land.  He also owns one cow and two sheep.  In his free time, he makes extra money working as a carpenter.  Dostonbek has turned to Arvand to request a loan.  He wants to renovate his house.  He thanks Arvand in advance for their support.
